SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY, NICKNAME, TITLE, COUNT, LIKED, B.CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) JOIN REPLY R ON (B.BOARD_NO = R.REF_BNO) WHERE R.REPLY_WRITER = (SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) AND B.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY BOARD_NO, CATEGORY, NICKNAME, TITLE, COUNT, LIKED, B.CREATE_DATE ORDER BY B.CREATE_DATE DESC
